Name: Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington: The Betrayal
Overview:
Assassin's Creed III: The Tyranny of King Washington - The Betrayal is a DLC (download content) for Assassin's Creed III and the second episode of the King Washington storyline. The story is set in an alternate timeline in which Ratonhnhaké:ton - the one known as Connor in the main game - never joined the Assassins and George Washington crowned himself as King of America after the Revolutionary War.

After the end of the first episode, Ratonhnhaké:ton finds himself as prisoner in Boston. He needs to escape and work together with the local rebels. During the course of this episode, he also receives the ability to fly.
